instructions.name: buy_tokens
docs: Buy tokens from the bonding curve

instructions.name: claim_vested_tokens
docs: Claim vested tokens that have unlocked

instructions.name: close_global_config
docs: Close the global configuration and recover rent (admin only)
This is a workaround for accounts with incompatible structure

instructions.name: get_claimable_amount
docs: View how many tokens are currently unlocked and claimable

instructions.name: initialize_bonding_curve
docs: Initialize a bonding curve for a token

instructions.name: initialize_global_config
docs: Initialize the global configuration for bonding curve parameters

instructions.name: initialize_vesting
docs: Initialize a vesting schedule for creator tokens
This locks tokens and releases them over time to prevent rug pulls

instructions.name: migrate_to_raydium
docs: Migrate bonding curve liquidity to Raydium when threshold is reached
This creates a Raydium pool and adds liquidity with all SOL and remaining tokens
Takes a 6 SOL migration fee that goes to the treasury

accounts.name: migration_sol_vault
docs: Migration vault to hold SOL before Raydium pool creation

accounts.name: migration_token_account
docs: Migration token account to hold tokens before Raydium pool creation

accounts.name: migration_authority
docs: Authority for the migration vault (a PDA)

instructions.name: sell_tokens
docs: Sell tokens back to the bonding curve

instructions.name: update_global_config
docs: Update the global configuration (admin only)

instructions.name: withdraw_migration_funds
docs: Withdraw funds from migration vault to create Raydium pool
This allows the platform to use migration vault funds for pool creation

accounts.name: migration_sol_vault
docs: Migration vault holding SOL

accounts.name: migration_token_account
docs: Migration token account holding tokens

accounts.name: migration_authority
docs: Authority for the migration vault (a PDA)

accounts.name: authority
docs: Platform authority who can withdraw

accounts.name: recipient
docs: Recipient for SOL

accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: Recipient token account

instructions.name: withdraw_platform_fees
docs: Withdraw accumulated platform fees from a bonding curve vault
Only the global authority can call this function

errors.name: InsufficientSOLForMigration
errors.msg: Insufficient SOL for migration (need at least 6 SOL fee + pool liquidity)
